greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor((sum of divisors of n) / (number of divisors of n)), or floor(sigma_1(n)/sigma_0(n)).
comment: Floor of mean of divisors of n. - _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Dec 24 2016
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: a(4)=2 since the 3 divisors of 4 are 1, 2 and 4 and floor((1 + 2 + 4)/3) = floor(7/3) = 2.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 21 2000
